mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.manage_id AS "manageId", a.check_point AS "checkPoint", a.check_element AS "checkElement", a.view_score AS "viewScore", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sort AS "sort"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audit_standard_detail( id, manage_id, check_point, check_element, view_score, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, sort ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{manageId}, #{checkPoint}, #{checkElement}, #{viewScore}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sort} )
mapper.update: UPDATE audit_standard_detail SET manage_id = #{manageId}, check_point = #{checkPoint}, check_element = #{checkElement}, view_score = #{viewScore}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, sort = #{sort} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.check_point AS "checkPoint", a.check_element AS "checkElement", a.view_score AS "viewScore", b.is_escore_nodes AS "isEescoreNodes", a.sort AS "sort" from audit_standard_detail a inner join audit_standard_flow b on a.manage_id = b.audit_standard_id where a.del_flag = '0' AND b.del_flag='0' and b.node = #{node} and b.flow=#{flow} order by a.sort asc
